mapper.select: SELECT SHOP_NAME, SHOP_CODE, SHOP_TELNUM, ADDRESS, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(${lon} ${lat})) AS DISTANCE, ST_X(ST_VALIDATE(LOCATION)) AS LAT, ST_Y(ST_VALIDATE(LOCATION)) AS LON FROM CMIS_STORE WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(${lon} ${lat})) <= 5000 ORDER BY DISTANCE

SELECT CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_CODE, CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_NAME, CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_DETAIL, CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE FROM CMIS_PRICES JOIN CMIS_PRO ON CMIS_PRICES.PRODUCT_NAME = CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE SHOP_NAME = #{shopName} AND CMIS_PRICES.RESEARCH_DATE = '2021-08-27' AND CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE <= CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_HOT_SALE_PRICE
select PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_LAST_AVERAGE_PRICE from CMIS_PRO where product_name like '%${value}%'

SELECT CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_CODE, CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_NAME, CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE, CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME,CMIS_STORE.SHOP_CODE,CMIS_STORE.SHOP_TELNUM,CMIS_STORE.ADDRESS, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(CMIS_STORE.LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(${lon} ${lat})) AS DISTANCE, ST_X(ST_VALIDATE(LOCATION)) AS LNG, ST_Y(ST_VALIDATE(LOCATION)) AS LON FROM CMIS_PRICES JOIN CMIS_STORE ON CMIS_PRICES.SHOP_NAME = CMIS_STORE.SHOP_NAME JOIN CMIS_PRO ON CMIS_PRICES.PRODUCT_NAME = CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(LOCATION, ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(${lon} ${lat})) <= 5000 AND CMIS_PRO.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${productName}%' AND CMIS_PRICES.RESEARCH_DATE = '2021-08-27' ORDER BY CMIS_PRICES.SALE_PRICE
